title: Character Description PRO with Multiplayer
description: Attach immersive, customizable tags to characters with unique descriptions for unmatched RP realism.
longDescription:
DEMO VIDEO

OUR ASSETS

OUR ASSETS 2

Free support for our products in Discord.


This Unreal Engine plugin offers powerful functionality for attaching various objects to your character. You can attach static and skeletal meshes, decals, sound effects, animations, and complex visual effects. Additionally, the plugin allows you to add custom descriptions to tags, which other players can see. For example, you can place a scar on your character and include a description stating it was received in a fight with wolves, and other players will be able to see this information. Furthermore, you can set tags to automatically disappear after a certain time, such as 30 minutes.

The plugin also provides customizable tag recognition times. For instance, if you attach a sheriff's badge with a number and set a 5-second recognition time, it will take another player that amount of time to inspect the badge and see the number. You can attach tags to any part of your character, adjusting the position and size for precise customization.

The plugin comes with an intuitive interface, allowing you to add new tags to the database with just a few clicks—no complicated setup required. This makes it an ideal solution for multiplayer games and RP projects, offering limitless character customization and enhancing player interaction.


Integration into your project takes only a few minutes.


Here’s a key feature list for your plugin:


  1. Attach Anything: Attach static meshes, skeletal meshes, decals, sounds, animations, and effects to characters.


  1. Custom Descriptions: Add personalized descriptions to tags visible to other players.


  1. Timed Disappearance: Set tags to automatically disappear after a specified time, like 30 minutes.


  1. Recognition Time: Customize the time required for players to recognize and read tags on characters.


  1. Precise Positioning: Attach tags to any part of the character, with adjustable position and size.


  1. User-Friendly Interface: Easily add new tags to the database with a few clicks, no complex setup needed.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  The code is written in C++ to improve performance. Using the plugin does not require knowledge of C++
  •  Easy to use and easy to integrate into your project
  •  Free support for our products in discord

Code Modules:

  • UCharacterDescriptionComponent(Type: Runtime)
  • ADescriptionActor(Type: Runtime)

Number of Blueprints: 3

Number of C++ Classes: 2

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Win64, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64, Mac, Linux

Documentation: Documentation, Discord

Example Project: Included

Important/Additional Notes:
